mapper.select: SELECT RENTAL_TN /* 차월 */ , PRM_MCN /* 선납개월 */ , PRM_DSCR /* 선납시 할인율 */ , PRM_DP_AMT AS PRM_AMT /* 선납금액 */ , PRM_STRT_Y || PRM_STRT_MM AS PRM_STRT_YM /* 선납기간from */ , PRM_END_Y || PRM_END_MM AS PRM_END_YM /* 선납기간to */ , PRM_DP_AMT / DECODE(PRM_MCN, 0, NULL, PRM_MCN) AS MM_PRM_DP_AMT /* 한달 선납액 (선납금액 / 선납개월) */ , PRM_DSC_AMT / DECODE(PRM_MCN, 0, NULL, PRM_MCN) AS MM_PRM_DSC_AMT /* 한달 할인 금액 (선납할인금액 / 선납개월) */ , EOT_ATAM AS PRPD_AMT /* 선수금액 */ , EOT_UC_AMT AS UC_AMT /* 미수금액 */ , EOT_ATAM + PRM_SL_AMT - PRM_BLAM_EOT_AMT AS PY_AMT /* 납입금액 */ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SELL_TP_CD IN (2, 3) /* 렌탈/멤버십 */ AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}

SELECT /* TODO: 확인 필요 */ T.RCNT /* 차월 */ , T.TOT_PRPM /* 총선납개월 */ , T.DSC_MM /* 할인대상선납개월 */ , T.DSC_RAT /* 선납시할인율 */ , T.DSC_AMT /* 할인대상선납금액 */ , T.NO_DSC_MM /* 미할인대상 선납개월 */ , T.NO_DSC_AMT /* 미할인대상 선납금액 */ , CASE WHEN T.DSC_AMT > 0 THEN ROUND(CEIL(T.DSC_AMT / DECODE(T.DSC_MM, 0, NULL, T.DSC_MM)), -1) ELSE ROUND(CEIL(T.NO_DSC_AMT / DECODE(T.TOT_PRPM, 0, NULL, T.TOT_PRPM)), -1) END AS MM_AMT /* 월납입금액 */ , CASE WHEN T.DSC_AMT > 0 THEN ROUND(CEIL(T.DSC_AMT / DECODE(T.DSC_MM * T.DSC_RAT, 0, NULL, T.DSC_MM * T.DSC_RAT)), -1) ELSE ROUND(CEIL(T.NO_DSC_AMT / DECODE(T.TOT_PRPM * T.DSC_RAT, 0, NULL, T.TOT_PRPM * T.DSC_RAT)), -1) END AS MM_DSC_AMT /* 한달할인금액 */ , T.ATAM /* 선수금액 */ , T.UC_AMT /* 미수금액 */ , T.DP_AMT /* 납입금액 */ , #{prmFromYm} AS PRM_FROM_YM /* 선납기간from */ , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{prmFromYm}, 'YYYYMM'), T.DSC_MM - 1), 'YYYYMM') AS PRM_TO_YM /* 선납기간to */ FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN B.RENTAL_TN IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE B.RENTAL_TN END AS RCNT /* 차월 */ , D1.SELL_AMT , D1.TOT_PRPM /* 총선납개월 */ , D1.DSC_MM /* 할인 대상 선납개월 */ , CASE WHEN D1.DSC_MM = 12 THEN 0.95 /* 5% 할인 */ WHEN D1.DSC_MM = 24 THEN 0.93 /* 7% 할인 */ WHEN D1.DSC_MM = 36 THEN 0.90 /* 10% 할인 */ ELSE 0 END AS DSC_RAT /* 선납시 할인율 */ , CASE WHEN D1.DSC_MM = 12 THEN ROUND(TRUNC(D1.SELL_AMT * 12 / DECODE(D1.TOT_PRPM, 0, NULL, D1.TOT_PRPM), -1), -1) WHEN D1.DSC_MM = 24 THEN ROUND(TRUNC(D1.SELL_AMT * 24 / DECODE(D1.TOT_PRPM, 0, NULL, D1.TOT_PRPM), -1), -1) WHEN D1.DSC_MM = 36 THEN ROUND(TRUNC(D1.SELL_AMT * 36 / DECODE(D1.TOT_PRPM, 0, NULL, D1.TOT_PRPM), -1), -1) ELSE 0 END AS DSC_AMT /* 할인대상 선납금액 */ , NO_DSC_MM /* 미할인 대상 선납개월 */ , ROUND(CEIL(D1.SELL_AMT * D1.NO_DSC_MM / DECODE(D1.TOT_PRPM, 0, NULL, D1.TOT_PRPM)), -1) AS NO_DSC_AMT /* 미할인 대상 선납금액 */ , NVL(D2.ATAM, 0) AS ATAM , NVL(D2.UC_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT /* 미수금액 */ , NVL(D2.DP_AMT, 0) AS DP_AMT FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A /* 계약상세 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ B /* WELLS매출월마감내역 */ ON B.SL_CL_YM = #{prmFromYm} AND B.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND B.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT M.SELL_AMT , M.TOT_PRPM /* 총선납개월 */ , CASE WHEN M.TOT_PRPM >= 12 AND M.TOT_PRPM < 24 THEN 12 WHEN M.TOT_PRPM >= 24 AND M.TOT_PRPM < 36 THEN 24 WHEN M.TOT_PRPM >= 36 THEN 36 ELSE 0 END AS DSC_MM /* 할인 대상 선납개월 */ , CASE WHEN M.TOT_PRPM < 12 THEN M.TOT_PRPM WHEN M.TOT_PRPM > 12 AND M.TOT_PRPM < 24 THEN M.TOT_PRPM - 12 WHEN M.TOT_PRPM > 24 AND M.TOT_PRPM < 36 THEN M.TOT_PRPM - 24 WHEN M.TOT_PRPM > 36 THEN M.TOT_PRPM - 36 ELSE 0 END AS NO_DSC_MM /* 미할인 대상 선납개월 */ FROM ( SELECT MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#{prmToYm},'YYYYMM'), TO_DATE(#{prmFromYm}, 'YYYYMM')) + 1 AS TOT_PRPM /* 총선납개월 */ , A.FNL_AMT AS SELL_AMT /* 최종금액 */ FROM DUAL ) M ) D1 ON 1 = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT NVL(EOT_ATAM, 0) AS ATAM /* 선수금액 */ , NVL(EOT_UC_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT /* 미수금액 */ , NVL(EOT_ATAM, 0) + NVL(PRM_SL_AMT, 0) - NVL(PRM_BLAM_EOT_AMT, 0) AS DP_AMT /* 납입금액 */ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN ORDER BY SL_CL_YM DESC FETCH FIRST ROWS ONLY ) D2 ON 1 = 1 WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND A.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd} ) T
